comments:
Build: I20070501-0010

1) Capture sleak snapshot
2) Open schema editor to overview tab
3) Close schema editor
4) Capture sleak diff

-> Each time steps are repeated, three images are leaked.

The same leak occurs when opening the information tab on the feature.xml editor.

Fixed.  Patch released to HEAD.

Target:  3.3 M7

Two Leaks:
(1) Overview Page -> Documentation Section
(2) Definition Page -> Description Section

XML configuration for source viewer was not disposed of in both cases.
XML configuration houses PDEQuickAssistAssistant which creates and disposes
of three images for marker resolutions.

Fixed.  Patch released to HEAD

One Leak:
(1) Information Page

XML configuration again.
